Text:
Thanks, but could you include all other non-Marvel NOW! titles as well next time? (eg. Ultimate comics, ASM, etc.)

Will be seeding anyway. Thanks!
Pletar, that would defeat the purpose of trying to have the Marvel Now titles in their own torrent if you allow other non Marvel Now titles in.

Sweet thanks. I was curious, if they're relaunching all these characters why is red she-hulk, which s on #59 a part of Marvel Now! Not saying it isn't, I was just ondering what the reasoning is behind it.
FriendlySpidey, I believe Hulk ended on issue #57 and they decided to use the numbering as continuation and start Red She-Hulk on #58 as a Marvel Now "relaunch".
Thank you!  This is much appreciated.
That is true BC_BATMAN, and Indestructible Hulk #1 comes out November 21st, along with Captain America (volume 7) #1
